snippet: The new gallery and arts center in Somerset, England, is finally ready for the public to explore its sprawling grounds, landscaped by Piet Oudolf and filled with site-specific sculptures by Phyllida Barlow.
abstract: The new gallery and arts center in Somerset, England, is finally ready for the public to explore its sprawling grounds, landscaped by Piet Oudolf and filled with site-specific sculptures by Phyllida Barlow.

headline.main: Hauser & Wirth's Newest Outpost in English Farm Country Is Now Open
